WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 12.00 noon on 06 September 2024.
Condition of Rain:
Showers may occur at  Several  places  in the sea  areas off the coast  extending from Puttalam to
Matara via Colombo and Galle.
Winds:
Winds will be south-westerly in direction and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

W
ind speed can increase up to (60-65) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Galle to Pottuvil via Matara and Hambantota.
Wind speed can increase up to (50-55) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending from
Trincomalee to Galle via  Kankasanthurai, Puttalam and Colombo..
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coasts extending from Galle to Pottuvil via Matara and Hambantota will be
rough or very rough at times.

T
he sea areas off the coasts extending from Mannar to Galle via Puttalam and Colombo will be fairly
rough at times.
